DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate the safety, toleration and pharmacokinetics of single oral doses of PF-04531083 in healthy male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: To Investigate The Safety, Toleration And Pharmacokinetics Of Single Oral Doses Of PF-04531083 In Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: young healthy male elderly unhealthy female
